Hello all. I'm trying to make a KSP cinematic, but ran into a rather major issue. When switching from my screen recorder (I use Krut) to KSP, instead of getting KSP I get a black bar in the top left corner of my screen. How can I avoid this?

Tested with other screen recorders. (ezvid, Media Encoder). Same result.

Not sure what is happening for you, but when I use OBS to record video of KSP, that doesnt happen. Perhaps try using OBS(If youre on windows) and see if the problem persists?

Also, OBS is a streaming software, but has the capability to just record to your harddrive instead of transmitting it to a server to stream. Its recordings are quite small for their good quality.

Hope that helps~

I think you'll like this thread
